title: I want my money back!
body: Hi, i recently got perma banned for idek why, and i had spent over 300 buckaroos on that account worth of rp. I need my money back if i am never going to get to play that account again!

replies.body:
I strongly recommend creating a support ticket as *Zombiemaster* mentioned. 

Since you seemed interested in it, I wanted to send you a link to our [Refund Policy](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ). Let me know if you have any questions.

I'm sorry but if there was no error on Riot's end in issuing the permanent ban, then it will not be lifted, and you will not be receiving a refund in your money.

If you don't know what the ban was for and you want more information, then you can submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

An important thing to remember regardless of the outcome of the situation is that the content you buy in LoL is basically digital add-ons for a video game, and if you ever are banned from that game for breaking rules, or if you just decide to stop playing cause you're bored of it or something, you have spent that money and it's not coming back. Heck someday (hopefully a very long time from now) LoL will likely shutdown, at which point bye bye skins.
